testcase.name: Verifying Adding New Teacher Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User clicks to Teacher Field...........................................passed And User clicks to Add Teacher field........................................passed And User types "Grace" in to first name field...............................passed And User types "Kelly " in to last name field...............................passed And User types "gkell@gmail.com" in to email field.........................passed And User types "3/2/2008" in to join date field.............................passed And User types "123456" in to password field................................passed And User types "World Wars" in to subject field.............................passed And User types "123456778" in to mobile number field........................passed And User selects "Female" from Gender dropdown..............................passed And User selects "Social Studies" from Department dropdown..................passed And User types "2/3/1980" in to Birth date field............................passed And User types "0" in to Salary field.......................................passed And User selects "12" in to batch field.....................................passed And User types "3" in to section field......................................passed And User types "123 Main St IL " in to permanent address field..............passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then User should be able to verify that her name is displayed in the teacher list.passed And Tester should be able to verify the new teacher's name is on the database.passed
